text: Hey, I am front end designer, can you tell me how to clone template in the new version of HubSpot?
Right click the template in finder

Is there a way to add a simple option for the editor to add a ID to the code?

It seems that “Text” adds a div to it, if I remember right.

I can’t use choice, because the user needs to be able to specify what the ID is.

For most use cases you probably want to be using custom modules, then use copy value instead of snippet.

If using hubl tags instead just add no_wrapper=true

<@UFCCJV5MM> there are a bunch of good HubDB tutorials in the CMS docs... these should give you some ideas on how this might work: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tutorials/how-to-build-dynamic-pages-with-hubdb>
